remarks: Rearrangement of lattice join of 4 classes.  ( ~ chj4 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2012.)
statement:
latjass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latjass.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latj4 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( Z e. B /\ W e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .\/ Y ) .\/ ( Z .\/ W ) ) = ( ( X .\/ Z ) .\/ ( Y .\/ W ) ) ) $.
